mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_order (o_id, buyer, image, title, price, d_price, count, o_date, isbn) VALUES(#{o_id}, #{buyer}, #{image}, #{title}, #{price}, #{d_price}, #{count}, SYSDATE, #{isbn})
mapper.select: SELECT o_id, buyer, image, title, price, d_price, count , o_date FROM my_order WHERE buyer = #{buyer} ORDER BY o_date DESC
